item.title: New Blog Platform
item.description: So…Pelican (my previous static site generator) took a dump on me when I went to upload my latest blog post… I attempted multiple paths to resurrect it, but they’ve all ultimately failed. ðŸ˜¢ As a result, I’m moving my site to Hugo, but that requires some conversion (and probably clean-up). It’s been a bit tedious, but it does mean I’ve cleaned up my ancient posts that are no longer relevant, which is a plus.
